docs.lead_paragraph: Prompted by the story of a girl who hired someone to beat her and make her miscarry, the legislation includes penalties of up to life in prison.

headline.main: Utah Bill Would Criminalize Illegal Abortions
headline.print_headline: Under Utah Legislation, Seeking Illegal Abortion Would Become a Crime

docs.snippet: Prompted by the story of a girl who hired someone to beat her and make her miscarry, the legislation includes penalties of up to life in prison.
